Package learn.nn.core

Class SingleLayerFeedForwardNeuralNetwork

java.lang.Object
learn.nn.core.NeuralNetwork
learn.nn.core.FeedForwardNeuralNetwork
learn.nn.core.SingleLayerFeedForwardNeuralNetwork
public abstract class SingleLayerFeedForwardNeuralNetwork extends FeedForwardNeuralNetwork
A SingleLayerFeedForwardNeuralNetwork is a single-layer feed-forward network where all the inputs are directly connected to the outputs (AIMA Section 18.7.2).

  • Nested Class Summary

  • Constructor Details

    • SingleLayerFeedForwardNeuralNetwork

      public SingleLayerFeedForwardNeuralNetwork​(InputUnit[] inputs, NeuronUnit[] outputs)
      Construct and return a new SingleLayerFeedForwardNeuralNetwork with the given InputUnits for inputs and NeuronUnits for outputs. It's up to you to arrange the feed-forward connections between the Units properly.

  • Method Details

    • dump

      public void dump()
      Print this SingleLayerFeedForwardNeuralNetwork to stdout. We output the weights on the output units in tab-delimited format: UNITNUM w_0 w_1 ... w_n.

    • train

      public void train​(List<Example> examples, double alpha)
      Train this SingleLayerFeedForwardNeuralNetwork on the given Examples, using given learning rate alpha. This means updating the weights on the output units for each example on each step.

    • train

      public void train​(Example example, double alpha)
      Train this SingleLayerFeedForwardNeuralNetwork on the given Example, using given learning rate alpha. This means updating the weights on the output units based on the example.

    • kFoldCrossValidate

      public double kFoldCrossValidate​(List<Example> examples, int k, double alpha)
      Run a k-fold cross-validation experiment on this SingleLayerFeedForwardNeuralNetwork using the given Examples and return the average accuracy over the k trials.
